title: Apple Barrel Acrylic Paint Set, PROMOTCK 18 (2 fl oz/59 ml) Assorted Matte Finish Colors For Painting, Drawing & Art Supplies, DIY Arts And Crafts Acrylic Paint For Kids And Adults
description: The Apple Barrel PROMOTCK 18 pc Acrylic Paint Set is the must-have paint kit for all your craft projects big and small. The bright, bold colors of this versatile acrylic paint kit are easy-to-use and glide on smoothly with excellent coverage. Use Apple Barrel Acrylic Paint on a variety of surfaces including wood, Styrofoam, plaster, terra cotta, and so much more! With 18 fun colors, you can brush, stamp, stencil or sponge this acrylic paint on all of your projects. Every crafter needs an affordable, quality set like the Apple Barrel PROMOTCK 18 pc Acrylic Paint Set as a key part of their go-to arts and crafts supplies.
